segments.text: As I glance around the kitchen, I notice the haphazardness of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, yet everything around her seems to be unraveling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe my eyes; that boy is practically defying gravity on that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water flows steadily, forming a puddle that could easily turn into a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout, to warn them, but I know it would spoil their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar looks inviting, almost too good to resist for those little hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to think about how easily something could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful expression makes my heart ache; she believes they are getting away with something great.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, I can’t shake off the feeling that the moment will soon shatter like glass.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just freeze time and prevent the impending disaster that awaits them.
segments.speaker: PAR
